channel.title: ~508~ How to change item stats~508~
channel.description:
Hey everyone the name up there says it all in this little tut i will show u all who dont know how to change item stats how to change them.
~~~REQUIREMENTS~~~ -508 source -508 client -Java jdk if you need a source/client just go to the server downloads.
~~~DIFFACULTY~~~ 1/10
Ok lets get started first you will need to get java jdk if you dont already have it. get it from here- http://www.java.com/en/ now change go to your cmd folder in your source [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/2588704a.jpg[/img] right click build and click edit change all of the wrong java jdk's to your number. [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/00-3.jpg[/img]
now you're set for the boring/fun part go to your bin folder then click data then items and then click items in the items folder lol mabe too much items? it's a mouth full heres a pic to make it easyier. [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/000-2.jpg[/img]
now once you have it open chose a item you want press ctrl f and find the item you want change the stats to what ever you want like this. after that save it and go back to your cmd folder click build. [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/0000-1.jpg[/img] Now it should compile start your server and run ur client now spawn that item u made the stats maxed now wear it and see if it worked if it did cogratz if it didnt leave a post and i will try my best to help. [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/00000-2.jpg[/img]
YOUR STATS SHOULD BE LIKE WHAT EVER U MADE THEM I MADE THIS 1 [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/000000-1.jpg[/img]
NEED HELP? JUST POST SAYING WHAT U NEED OR GO TO SERVER HELP.

item.title: ~508~ How to change item stats~508~
item.dc:creator: @stealth_king stealth king
item.description:
@stealth_king wrote:

Hey everyone the name up there says it all in this little tut i will show u all who dont know how to change item stats how to change them.

~REQUIREMENTS~
-508 source
-508 client
-Java jdk
if you need a source/client just go to the server downloads.

~DIFFACULTY~
1/10

Ok lets get started first you will need to get java jdk if you dont already have it. get it from here- http://www.java.com/en/
now change go to your cmd folder in your source

right click build and click edit change all of the wrong java jdk’s to your number.

00-3.jpg946×709

now you’re set for the boring/fun part go to your bin folder then click data then items and then click items in the items folder lol mabe too much items? it’s a mouth full heres a pic to make it easyier.

now once you have it open chose a item you want press ctrl f and find the item you want change the stats to what ever you want like this. after that save it and go back to your cmd folder click build.

0000-1.jpg946×707

Now it should compile start your server and run ur client now spawn that item u made the stats maxed now wear it and see if it worked if it did cogratz if it didnt leave a post and i will try my best to help.

YOUR STATS SHOULD BE LIKE WHAT EVER U MADE THEM I MADE THIS 1

NEED HELP? JUST POST SAYING WHAT U NEED OR GO TO SERVER HELP.

Read full topic
